about.title: The Company
about.description: Explore a world where medieval tales come to life through the magic of puppets. Our company is dedicated to reviving ancient stories for a modern audience.

company.title: The Company
company.subtitle: Our history and mission
company.history_p1: The Compagnie des Oreilles was born from a shared passion for forgotten tales and the art of puppetry. Since 2010, we have been traveling the roads of France to share our unique universe.
company.history_p2: Our shows combine object theater, table puppets, and traditional tales, revisited with a touch of modernity and humor.
company.history_p3: We believe in the power of imagination to bring generations together and spark wonder, whatever the age.
